rooms.description: Small foyer with built-in storage and a small sitting area.
Spacious living area with large window openings for natural light and cross ventilation; adjacent to the garden view.
Open space near the kitchen area with access to an outdoor seating area or garden patio.
Primary bedroom facing east for auspicious morning light according to Vastu guidelines; includes a small attached balcony with indirect ventilation and privacy screens.
Secondary bedroom on the north side, ensuring quiet ambiance and ample natural light through south-facing windows.
Compact guest room with an ensuite bathroom located to maintain privacy while maximizing daylight exposure.
Functional kitchen space with open layout for social interaction; features a central island and ample storage; positioned centrally to allow ventilation from multiple sides.
Adjacent utility area for quick meals or preparation, integrated with kitchen design.
Open balcony space providing connection to the garden and enhanced cross ventilation; used by living room and master bedroom.
Secondary bedroom with enhanced natural light through large south-facing windows; provides privacy and a connection to the garden.
Multi-purpose storage space for household items, maintenance supplies, or an additional guest bath.
Loft area under the roof with potential for a study or hobby room; ensures good ventilation and access to natural light via skylights.
